snippet: Mr. Azenberg, the producer of "Lost in Yonkers" and "Brighton Beach Memoirs," among many other plays, will get the lifetime achievement prize at the June ceremony.
abstract: Mr. Azenberg, the producer of "Lost in Yonkers" and "Brighton Beach Memoirs," among many other plays, will get the lifetime achievement prize at the June ceremony.

headline.main: Emanuel Azenberg, Neil Simon's Favorite Producer, Will Get Special Tony Award
